basics.name: Lorenzo Serina
basics.label: AI Consultant & PhD Researcher
basics.summary: Computer Engineer and PhD Researcher specializing in Deep Learning, NLP, and Automated Planning. I bridge the gap between advanced research and enterprise solutions, combining academic rigor with production experience.

work.name: SIMILAR (Startup)
work.summary: Led the entire technical direction for an innovative startup focused on digital accessibility and content analysis. Developed 5+ functional prototypes and deployed 2 commercial products using LLMs, RAG, and Computer Vision.

work.name: BBS (for Rai Way)
work.summary: Designed and developed a Virtual Conversational Agent (Chatbot) for Rai Way, the Italian national television transmission network. The system is currently in production handling real-time customer support.

work.name: KINETIKON
work.summary: Delivered corporate training programs helping professionals integrate AI tools into their daily workflows. Conducted hands-on workshops on Generative AI, Python, and Software Architecture.

education.area: Computer Science - Deep Learning for Automated Planning

publications.name: Towards Efficient Online Goal Recognition through Deep Learning
publications.summary: Novel deep learning approach for efficient online goal recognition achieving high accuracy with partial observations.

publications.name: Synonyms, Antonyms and Factual Knowledge in BERT Heads
publications.summary: Investigation into how BERT transformer heads encode semantic relationships.

publications.name: A Preliminary Study on BERT applied to Automated Planning
publications.summary: Exploring the application of BERT language models to automated planning tasks.

projects.name: Rai Way Virtual Assistant
projects.summary: Enterprise chatbot for Italian national broadcasting infrastructure, currently in production.

projects.name: SIMILAR R&D
projects.summary: End-to-end R&D for a startup accelerated by Mondadori, building LLM and Computer Vision solutions.
